title: Great quotes of history
author: VD
content_html:
“If I drink water I will have to urinate, and how can I urinate when my people are in bondage?”

– Saddam Hussein

Truth is funnier than fiction.
content_text:
“If I drink water I will have to urinate, and how can I urinate when my people are in bondage?”
– Saddam Hussein
